content: Based on the information you provided, the weapon system in your game allows players to arm themselves with a variety of weapons and use different Mana types to attack enemies and defend themselves. The player can unlock new weapons and enhance them with Manacite, which gives them additional skills and passive effects. The player can switch between different Mana types to adapt to different combat situations and use their weapons in a variety of ways. Is that a correct understanding of the weapon system?
